#summary Known bugs in current release.

  * Vertical axis tick labels get clipped near origin
  * Marker labels can sometimes show through outside the bounds of the chart
  * Domain Axis labels sometimes disappear at weird places (mostly blank axis)
  * FontBook rendering on Linux doesn't look as good as Windows/OSX
  * GWT-Exporter can yield infinite loop in export() method in some instances
  * GWT exporter doesn't automatically inherit exported methods from interfaces
  * Axis precision does nothing right now
